text: accessibility both sides of the river with plenty of attractions within a good location. only one pillow which was too big would have preferred two smaller ones to enable adjustment

Clean good size rooms and bathroom Staff friendly and helpful Good location. Accessibility of hotel on busy road Difficult to reach to find out where to park then to park across the road and then haul bags to reception to check in
Very good breakfast Great location. As in most London locations small rooms and small elevator
Good location near underground station There is kitchen in a room. there is no elevator

Fantastic location in terms of accessibility to St Pancras station Within walking distance 15 minutes of UCL Great sized room contained 2 single beds and a double Microwave fridge iron ironing board hairdryer all provided Good selection of continental breakfast choices. Nothing
Very good location close to Paddington station A lot of good restaurants near by for breakfast in the morning. The elevator was not working
Friendly staff and good location. Only one elevator so some time you have to wait to get to your room

Excellent attitude of the team especially Shaune ready to address any request and providing solutions good breakfast good location good room Hotel is being upgraded. Some rooms are small elevator is small
Very good and quiet location. Room located next to the service elevator shaft Disturbing and noisy Hotel pretty worn out and requires immediate investment
The rooms were well equipped and clean Very good location Staff were good. The elevator system was cumbersome two elevators and having to hold the button The rooms were small
Close to underground Good location. There would be more room in a London telephone box No elevator from ground floor Noise can be an issue
Good location close to the Underground station next to a very lively street. The rooms are very small and so is the tiny elevator Not a very good quality price ratio
Good location for getting around Most of the staff was helpful Good breakfast Very clean. Top floor is awful Beds are old and the street side is noisy even late at night No elevator
Good buffet breakfast Quiet location near British Museum Air conditioner works well on cold days Business room has a large desk and bright lights. Only one elevator near front desk
good location nice staff nice ground floor common area with meeting rooms. I was expecting a breakfast at a 4 for 259 pounds per night 4 floors hotel but no elevator
The location is very good and there are plenty of great restos and pubs around. The elevator is broken and the room is soooo hot as the aircon is not getting cold

Good location very clean nicely decorated friendly staff good continental breakfast included. One elevator out of order so long waiting at times bed was way too soft wasn t able to regulate room temperature so it was very warm at times
I like the way that the reception treated as was perfect and the hotel location it s very good. The elevator Left so bad and annoying The toilet door wasn t good you have to hold it while u using it

Good location nice setting beds were very comfortable nice bathroom and very good coffee at breakfast. Only found one elevator so slow getting up and down no coffee service in rooms only tea and front desk staff was not the friendliest
A great location good layout of the room. No elevator This was not a problem as my luggage was light but with a heavy suitcase or for older people this could be a problem
